```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(faraway)
library(stats)
library(EnvStats)

require("faraway")

#################################################

A <- c(2, 3, 4)
B <- c(-1, 0, 1, 2)
C <- c(4, 5, 6)

set.intersection <- function(a, b){
  intersect <- vector()
  for (i in 1:length(a)){
    if (a[i] %in% b){
      intersect <- append(intersect, a[i])
    }
  }
  return(intersect)
}

set.union <- function(a, b) {
  u <- a
  for (i in 1:length(b)){
    if (!(b[i] %in% u)){
      u <- append(u, b[i])
    }
  }
  return(u)
}

D <- set.intersection(A, B)

set.union(C, D)
```
